title: Deloitte Top 200: Chief executive of the year - Sky TV’s Sophie Moloney
description: Sophie Moloney’s five-year turnaround has lifted Sky’s share price to around $3.50.
content:
But that idea of enabling people to bring their whole selves to work, I think, is the key to unlocking amazing productivity.
